name: Buddy and The Bud
description:
Collect as many water drops as you can and help Bud - your tiny plant, grow! The more, the better, and the plant would be greater!  But don't let Bud grow out of reach and leave you behind! You'll encounter some nasty bugs along the way - avoid them at all costs! 

Controls: arrow keys to move left and right, Z for jumping, Enter to start a game

This game was created using Godot Engine for developing game, Aseprite- animated sprite editor and pixel art tool (https://www.aseprite.org/), and ChipTone (https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone) for creating sound effects.

This is my first entry for GBJam10, and the second game I've ever made (in about 5 days). In order to improve both myself and the game, I'm planning on many additional changes. Keep growing!
